          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Ligger en punkt på linjen?</string>
            <string language="en">Lies a point on the line?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Liegt ein Punkt auf der Zeile?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Se trouve-t-il un point sur la ligne ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontra-se um ponto na linha?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Si trova un punto sulla riga?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βρίσκεται ένα σημείο στη γραμμή;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Miente una punta en la línea?</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">En annan typ av uppgift är att avgöra om en punkt ligger på en viss given linje.Modul 5 - Funktioner.Matematik B - Åsö.</string>
            <string language="en">Another type of information is to decide if a point lies on a certain given line.

Module 5 - functions.

Mathematics B - Åsö.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Matematik B</string>
            <string language="sv">matematik</string>
            <string language="sv">funktion</string>
            <string language="sv">funktioner</string>
            <string language="sv">given linje</string>
            <string language="sv">punkt på linje</string>

            <string language="en">functions</string>
            <string language="en">obvious line</string>
            <string language="en">point on line</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein anderer Typ Informationen soll entscheiden, wenn ein 
Punkt auf einem bestimmten gegebenen line.Module 5 - 
functions.Mathematics B - Åsö liegt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un autre type d'information doit décider si un point se 
trouve sur un certain line.Module indiqué 5 - functions.Mathematics B
- Åsö.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um outro tipo de informação deve decidir-se se um ponto 
se encontrar em um determinado line.Module dado 5 - 
functions.Mathematics B - Åsö.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un altro tipo di informazioni deve decidere se un punto si
trova su un determinato dato line.Module 5 - functions.Mathematics B -
Åsö.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα άλλο είδος πληροφοριών είναι να αποφασίσει εάν 
ένα σημείο βρίσκεται σε μια ορισμένη δεδομένη ενότητα γραμμών 5
- μαθηματικά β λειτουργιών - Εsφ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Otro tipo de información es decidir a si una punta miente
en cierto line.Module dado 5 - functions.Mathematics B - Åsö.</string>
          </description>
